objects.name: Analytic 0833
objects.description: Detects invocation of macOS-native archiving utilities (zip, ditto, hdiutil) or openssl used for encryption. Correlates execution with archive or encrypted file creation (.zip, .dmg, .tar.gz) in user or temporary directories. Identifies anomalous use of archiving commands by Office applications or daemons.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of zip, ditto, hdiutil, or openssl by processes not normally associated with archiving

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Creation of .zip, .dmg, .tar.gz files in /Users, /tmp, or application directories

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Business-approved applications permitted to create archives (e.g., backup agents).
Flag archiving under privileged or service accounts as higher risk.
Entropy threshold for detecting encrypted archives versus normal compression.
